remarks: A Hilbert lattice element covered by the join of two distinct atoms is an atom.  ( ~ atcvat2i analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrat2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrat2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cvrat2.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrat2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cvrat2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. B /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ X C ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> X e. A ) $.
